video.title: Elias: Rescue Team Adventures
video.synopsis: A rescue boat named Elias sails into adventure and discovers the importance of safety, getting along with others, being part of a community and more.

episodes.synopsis: No one helps stranded Cruiser because they think he's a pirate, but it's just a costume for a party; the younger boats test Trawler's heroism claims.
episodes.title: The Pretend Pirate / Monster of the Deep

episodes.synopsis: Elias cares for an egg found in the debris after a storm; Elias fails a safety test but he gets a real-life opportunity to prove his skill.
episodes.title: Quite Eggstraordinary / Check Up

episodes.synopsis: Elias runs into trouble while exploring, but he didn't tell anyone where he was going; Trolley stows away on Trawler to spend a day in Cozy Cove.
episodes.title: Looking for Trouble / Trolley's Day Out

episodes.synopsis: Elias fills in as a lightship and Helinor looks for a replacement when Big Blinky's bulb blows out; Elias gets back at Rocky for splashing everyone.
episodes.title: Elias Lights the Way / Speedy Smacky

episodes.synopsis: Trawler's friends must save him during a violent storm; Swifty runs out of power on a trip to Echo Cave and can't summon help.
episodes.title: Anchors Away / Echo Cave Adventure

episodes.synopsis: Rocky causes a blackout when he tries to stage a light show; Elias and Dippy help Smacky regain his confidence with boatloads of herring.
episodes.title: Light Show / Who Took All the Fish

episodes.synopsis: Elias leads the mission to stop a runaway iceberg from striking Golden Bay; Cruiser thinks he belongs on the rescue team after he "saves" two boats.
episodes.title: Iceberg / Hero Cruiser

episodes.synopsis: Smacky dozes off in treacherous waters; Rocky, Cruiser and Princess "rough it" in Cozy Cove when an oil slick pollutes Golden Bay.
episodes.title: Spring Clean / Cozy Guests

episodes.synopsis: Crane wishes she could visit a far-off island, so the boats build one around her; Rocky's new superpowered engine sends him speeding out of control.
episodes.title: Crane's Holiday/ Fast Forward

episodes.synopsis: Swifty's cries for help are mistaken for the song of a mermaid; despite Big Blinky's warning, Princess and Cruiser rush off into the fog to play.
episodes.title: Swifty the Mermaid / Princess' Fog Horn

episodes.synopsis: When a shipping container sinks, Elias has an ingenious idea to solve the problem; Elias battles the elements to bring music to the Cozy Cove parade.
episodes.title: Major Disaster / Cozy Cove Parade

episodes.synopsis: Princess tries to prove she doesn't need a compass during a sudden storm; Smacky drifts into trouble when he falls asleep after an exhausting haul.
episodes.title: North, East, South, West / The Big Sleep

episodes.synopsis: Elias braves the Scary Straits when Helinor's medical delivery drifts into them; Smacky and Goliath try to find out why they've started squeaking.
episodes.title: Don't Go There / Things That Go Squeak in the Night

episodes.synopsis: Elias will do anything to get out of visiting Goliath to have his barnacles removed; Cruiser doesn't want to clean up the morning after a party.
episodes.title: Elias' Barnacles / Litter Lout

episodes.synopsis: Elias is so eager for the Cozy Cove Water Sprint that he does a poor job setting buoys for the race; Elias breaks his winch while surfing.
episodes.title: Buoys Ahoy / Surfing Disaster

episodes.synopsis: Cruiser's refusal to do recycling duty means more -- and dangerous -- work for everyone else; Princess learns the rules of the high seas.
episodes.title: Trolley's Scary Day / Princess Wises Up

episodes.synopsis: When Smacky breaks a piston, only far-away Windeville has a replacement; Cruiser accidentally breaks a crate meant for Elias.
episodes.title: Old Parts / Cruise's Big Mistake

episodes.synopsis: The boats have engine trouble when they're accidentally given sunflower oil; Rocky loses a propeller while disturbing Elias and Dippy's fish watching.
episodes.title: Slow Boats / Bling Thing

episodes.synopsis: Rocky finds himself in over his head when he fills in for Elias, who's run out of fuel; Trawler tries to teach Princess how to be a fishing boat.
episodes.title: Rocky's Rescue / Fishing Trip

episodes.synopsis: Trolley's newly oiled wheels make him too slippery to stay on the track; the boats pitch in when Trawler can't work because of a lost starting crank.
episodes.title: Trolley's New Wheels / Bilge!

episodes.synopsis: Trawler falls asleep while on a day trip to Gull Island with the younger boats; Swifty won't sit still for repairs when Princess gets a new game.
episodes.title: The Longest Play on the Longest Day / Helinor's First Aid Treatment

episodes.synopsis: Elias gets a chance to be a pilot ship when Trawler gets stuck on a sandbank; the friends must stop a fire that's headed for the Gull Island reserve.
episodes.title: Operation Pilot Ship / Helinor's Bucket

episodes.synopsis: Elias and Dippy must find a way to rescue Helinor when she crashes and gets stuck on a tall stack; Dippy grows sad when she has engine trouble.
episodes.title: Stuck on a Stack / Engine Trouble

episodes.synopsis: Stuck on her rock, Little Blinky feels left out until she's called upon to rescue Smacky; Smacky and his friends visit Windeville to meet a giant.
episodes.title: I Spy with My Little Eye / Windeville Giant

episodes.synopsis: Elias is sure that debris found on Razor Reef is from a pirate shipwreck; Elias, Princess, Cruiser and Rocky run afoul of spilled fish paste.
episodes.title: Ship Wreck / A Fishy Tail

episodes.synopsis: Trawler's friends come to the rescue when he takes on a job delivering live fish; the boats run into trouble finding the perfect gift for Big Blinky.
episodes.title: A-Live-A-Live-Oh! / Big Blinky's Big Day
